answers.answer: That sounds out of the ordinary, good call getting blood work.I hope it is nothing serious!
Go see your dr. You might have high blood pressure or something else... Go get check can be serious

My feet are bad as well and the left one is the worst and my dr told me it normal that sometime one get more swollen than the other bc we apply more pressure on one side of are body then other if you don't have headaches or dizziness or seeing blurr or high blood pressure or bad abdominal pain then don't worry but if u happen to get any this do go to the dr or hospital
Go to the docs. Swelling in the face and neck are not good signs usually could be symptoms for preeclampsia or not but best to go to your doc to make sure everything is ok

question: I know swelling is normal but the past two weeks I have become swollen all over. My face hands arms....my feet are literally five times normal size and my left one is more swollen. Anyways my question is have any of yall experience swelling like this..my feet throb im hurting all over any advice..and my dr is doing bloodwork.
title: swelling?
